text:
水族館を満喫しきって、今は向かい側の広場に来ている。
やっと濡れた衣服が乾いてきたが、湿気た煙草はどうにもならねぇ。 そんな俺を見て、俺等だけ避難しちまったから、と碧棺が一本差し出してきた。 意外と律儀な奴だ。
偶の休日に、普段とは違う銘柄吹かすってのも悪くねぇだろ。 折角貰ったんだから、とガキ共がはしゃいでるのを遠目に見ながら、喫煙所で煙草に火を付けた。
「隣、いいだろうか？」
trans:
After fulling enjoying the aquarium, we are not at the plaza across the street.
My soaked clothes have finally started to dry, but there's no saving my damp cigarettes. Watching me, Aohitsugi offered me one, saying, "We're the only ones who managed to take cover, after all." Surprisingly considerate of him.
On a rare day off, trying a different brand of cigarettes isn't so bad. Might as well, since he gave it to me. As I lit the cigarette at the smoking area, I kept an eye on the kids playing in the distance.
"Mind if I sit next to you?"
